import {Meta} from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';

<Meta title="Templates/Components/SearchTemplate"/>

# Default Search Template Factory

```jsx
const DefaultSearchTemplateFactory = props => {

	const {Component = SearchTemplate, ...otherProps} = props;

	const QuickSearchComposed = R.compose(withQuickSearchCriteria, withQuickSearchFields)(QuickSearch);
	const SearchTemplateComposed = R.compose(withSearchTemplateConfigLoader)(Component);

	return (
		<SearchTemplateComposed {...otherProps} QuickSearchComponent={QuickSearchComposed}/>
	);
};
```
